content.value:
Bought 8 things from Debenhams in their closing down sale.
Paid £2.99 for regular delivery, rather than a fiver for next day.
They've dispatched each item out individually! A different courier every day.
No idea what bulk rate they pay, but easy to see why they've gone bust!
